attributes.action: Answer questions in completion and PM questions time, instead of giving a history lesson about what "Party X" did "Y decades ago"
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: Gordon Brown never answers questions in completion and always goes off on a tangent, giving the house a history lesson about what the state of the country was under "Party X" was like "Y Years" ago.  What happened 20 years ago has no bearing on questions about what the Government is doing or proposing to do now.  We the undersigned petition to PM to stop giving history lessons to the  House in order to avoid answering questions

reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
